response.overview: Mandi (English: Market Place) is a 1983 Hindi-language film directed by Shyam Benegal. Based on a classic Urdu short story Aanandi by writer Ghulam Abbas, the film narrates the story of a brothel, situated in the heart of a city, an area that some politicians want for its prime locality.
response.title: Market

results.name: Mandi - Naseeruddin Shah | Smita Patil | Shabana Azmi | Bollywood Best Movie
